title: Fort Necessity National Battlefield: Internships
body: Internships         The National Park Service offers unique internship opportunities, such as living history demonstrations.   College credits may be earned through internships. College students should speak with their advisers about the number of hours required to earn college credit.   Housing and RV campsite are available for full time volunteers and interns. Training, volunteer uniform shirts and/or living history costumes may be provided. Historic black powder weapons training for living history soldiers in usually held in early June.      Â    Send a message to the volunteer coordinator for more information.
